      • getQuestion

        Question getQuestion(Player player)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Gets the question to be submitted to the player.
        Parameters:
        player - the player which want to play
        Returns:
        the chosen question
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - the remote exception

      • answerQuestion

        boolean answerQuestion(Question question,
                       Option option,
                       Player player)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Answer question allows the player to answer a question
        Parameters:
        question - the question submitted to the player
        option - the option chosen by the player
        player - the player who answered the question
        Returns:
        true, if the answer is correct
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - the remote exception

      • getCorrectAnswerHistory

        java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> getCorrectAnswerHistory(Player player)
                                                                             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Withdraws from the database the quetions answered correctly from the player. The map key is the questionID, the String is the Question's text
        Parameters:
        player - which make the request
        Returns:
        the list of questions with their ids
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
